get.summary: Get a list of all Anvendersystem (user system)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the Anvendersystem (user system) to delete

parameters.name: id

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A list of Anvenderkontekster to add to the list of Anvenderkontekster for this Anvendersystem

delete.description: Delete a specific Anvenderkontekst (user context) from this Anvendersystem (user system)

parameters.name: id1
parameters.description: The id of the Anvendersystem (user system)

parameters.name: id2

parameters.description: The id of the Anvendersystem (user system)

parameters.description: The list of ImpersonationAssignments to add

delete.summary: Delete an ImpersonationAssignment on an Anvendersystem (user system)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the Anvendersystem (user system)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The ImpersonationAssignment to delete

put.summary: Add a list of RoleAssignments to to the list of RoleAssignments for this Anvendersystem (user system)
put.description: Add a list of RoleAssignments to to the list of RoleAssignments for this Anvendersystem (user system). The role assignments are added to the list, and the existing ones are left unchanged. If a role assignment already in the list, is added, then the existing role assignment is replaced with the one being added.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the Anvendersystem (user system)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A list of RoleAssignments to add to the list of RoleAssignments for this Anvendersystem

delete.summary: Delete a specific RoleAssignment from this Anvendersystem (user system)
delete.description: Delete a specific RoleAssignment from this Anvendersystem (user system)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the Anvendersystem (user system)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The specification for the RoleAssignment to delete

Anvenderkontekst.description: The Anvenderkontekst (user context) for the role assignment to delete. The Anvenderkontekst is specified as the CVR of the organization.

ServiceId.description: The Id of the service for the role assignment to delete

ServicesystemrolleId.description: The Id (claim type) of the Servicesystemrolle to delete

put.summary: Add an OCES Certifikat on a specific Anvendersystem (user system)
put.description: Add an OCES Certifikat on a specific `Anvendersystem` object.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the Anvendersystem (user system)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The OCES Certifikat to add

Base64.description: A base64 encoded string representing the certificate for this Anvendersystem (user system). The string MUST be the certificate in PEM format, and MUST NOT contain Begin- and End lines. The string MUST only contain the actual base64 encoded data.

delete.summary: Delete an OCES Certifikat on a specific Anvendersystem (user system)
delete.description: Delete an OCES Certifikat on a specific `Anvendersystem` object.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the Anvendersystem (user system)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The OCES Certifikat to delete

Base64.description: A base64 encoded string representing the certificate for this Anvendersystem (user system). The string MUST be the certificate in PEM format, and MUST NOT contain Begin- and End lines. The string MUST only contain the actual base64 encoded data.

put.description: Add a Dataafgraensningstype to the Servicesystemrolle

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the service system role to add a Dataafgraensningstype for

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The Dataafgraensningstype to add

delete.description: Delete a Dataafgraensningstype from the Servicesystemrolle

Aktiveringstidspunkt.description: Aktiveringstidspunkt (activation time). A time ranges, when an object is enabled.

Sluttidspunkt.description: The end time for this Aktiveringstidspunkt (activation time)

Starttidspunkt.description: The start time for this Aktiveringstidspunkt (activation time)

Aktiveringstidspunkt.description: The Aktiveringstidspunkt (activation time) during which, the Anvenderkontekst (user context) is enabled.

Cvr.description: The CVR of the organization this Anvenderkontekst (user context) represents

Id.description: The unique id of this Anvendsystem (user system). This property is required to e.g. delete an Anvendersystem (user system).

OcesCertifikater.description: A list of certificates for this Anvendersystem (user system).

items.title: OcesCertifikat
items.description: A base64 encoded string representing the certificate for this Anvendersystem (user system). The string MUST be the certificate in PEM format, and MUST NOT contain Begin- and End lines. The string MUST only contain the actual base64 encoded data.

RoleAssignments.description: A list of Servicesystemrolle (service system roles) assigned to this Anvendersystem (user system).

ImpersonationAssignments.description: A list of impersonation assignments (service system roles) assigned to this Anvendersystem (user system).

Id.description: The Id (namespace) of this Dataafgrænsningstype (data restriction type)

SyntaxDefinition.description: Definition of the syntax that is used to define this data restriction

PresentationPreference.description: The presentation preference of this data restriction type

ValidationService.description: The URL of a validation service

PresentationName.description: The presentation name of this data restriction type

Description.description: A description of this data restriction type

Values.description: A list of data restriction values for this data restriction type

Dataafgraensningsvaerdi.description: A Dataafgraensningsvaerdi (data restriction value) for a Dataafgraensningstype (data restriction type)

DataafgraensningstypeId.description: The Dataafgraensningstype (data restriction type) for this Dataafgraensningsvaerdi (data restriction value). This is the ID of the Dataafgraensningstype, which is defined as a URL.

Datarestriction.description: A data restriction is key,value pair consisting of a data restriction type, and a data restriction value.

ImpersonationAssignment.description: The relation between an Anvenderkontekst (user context) and OCES certificate for an Anvendersystem

Anvenderkontekst.description: The Anvenderkontekst (user context) this role assignment applies to. The Anvenderkontekst is specified as the CVR of the organization.

OcesCertificate.description: A base64 encoded string representing the certificate for this Anvendersystem (user system). The string MUST be the certificate in PEM format, and MUST NOT contain Begin- and End lines. The string MUST only contain the actual base64 encoded data.

Aktiveringstidspunkt.description: The Aktiveringstidspunkt, when the impersonation assignment is active

RoleAssignment.description: The relation between an Anvendersystem (user system) and assigned Servicesystemrolle for a Service

Anvenderkontekst.description: The Anvenderkontekst (user context) this role assignment applies to. The Anvenderkontekst is specified as the CVR of the organization.

Datarestrictions.description: A list of {data restriction type, data restriction value} for this role assignment. Each role assignment can have multiple data restriction values, and each values is related to a specific type, and this array property captures these key,value-pairs

ServiceId.description: The Id of the service this role assignment applies to

Id.description: The Id of this SAML metadata document

Aktiveringstidspunkt.description: The Aktiveringstidspunkt, when the Service Metadata is enabled.

Id.description: The SAML2.0 EntityId of the service. The EntityId must be globally unique within the federation, and cannot be shared by any other service, identity provider or user system.

ServiceMetadata.description: A list of SAML2.0 metadata for this service

Servicesystemrolle.description: Servicesystemrolle (service system role). A Servicesystemrolle (service system role) is related to exactly one `Service`. A `Service` can have 0 or more `Servicesystemrolle` related.

Version.description: The version of the user system role. This is also the SAML2.0 attribute name (claim type) of the SAML attribute that is issued in the user token.

Aktiveringstidspunkt.description: An Aktiveringstidspunkt (activation time), when this Servicesystemrolle (service system role) is enabled.

Dataafgraensningstyper.description: A list of Dataafgraensningstyper (data restriction types) this Servicesystemrolle supports
